title: Tree-LSTM Semantic Visualizer
description: An interactive app for visualizing syntactic and semantic structure using Tree-LSTM models. Parses natural language input, generates constituency trees with semantic embeddings, and allows users to explore how meaning composition works in hierarchical structures.

title: Catalog Enrichment
description: Built end-to-end pipelines using Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) and LLMs to enrich product metadata and classify taxonomy across diverse e-commerce platforms. Designed scalable ETL pipelines in Databricks, orchestrated Snowflake workloads, and deployed solutions via Azure for near real-time enrichment.

title: Hydroponic Farm
description: Designed predictive analytics pipeline for a small farm in Montreal. Cleaned multi-year agricultural sensor data, modeled plant weight and health based on nutrient flow and location using regression techniques, and deployed a relational database backend on Google Cloud for integration with no-code tools.
